ViewObject.Name: CuxProjectWorkplanForWFVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery: /*SELECT ppe.proj_element_id, ppev.element_version_id, (SELECT pps.project_status_name FROM pa_proj_elements ppe_top_task, pa_proj_element_versions ppev_phase, pa_proj_elements ppe_phase, pa_project_statuses pps WHERE ppe_top_task.proj_element_id = (SELECT pa_proj_elements_utils.get_top_task_id(ppev.element_version_id) FROM pa_proj_element_versions ppev, pa_proj_elem_ver_structure ppevs WHERE ppev.parent_structure_version_id = ppevs.element_version_id AND ppevs.latest_eff_published_flag = 'Y' AND ppev.proj_element_id = ppe.proj_element_id) AND ppe_top_task.phase_version_id = ppev_phase.element_version_id AND ppev_phase.proj_element_id = ppe_phase.proj_element_id AND pps.project_status_code = ppe_phase.phase_code) phase_name, ppev.parent_structure_version_id, ptt.task_type, ppe.name task_name, ppe.element_number, ppe.description, ppe.project_id, status.project_status_name, status.status_icon_active_ind, status.project_system_status_code, ppevsch.scheduled_start_date, ppevsch.scheduled_finish_date, decode((SELECT COUNT(1) FROM cux_quality_mag_detail cqmd WHERE cqmd.task_id = ppe.proj_element_id), 0, '否', '是') AS is_planed, decode((SELECT COUNT(1) FROM cux_quality_mag_detail cqmd WHERE cqmd.task_id = ppe.proj_element_id), 0, 'N', 'Y') AS show_detail FROM pa_proj_elements ppe, pa_proj_element_versions ppev, pa_proj_elem_ver_schedule ppevsch, pa_task_types ptt, pa_projects_all ppa, per_all_people_f papf, pa_percent_completes ppc, pa_project_statuses status, pa_project_statuses progress, pa_lookups priority, pa_lookups CLASS, pa_progress_rollup ppr, cux_quality_mag_header cqmh WHERE priority.lookup_type(+) = 'PA_TASK_PRIORITY_CODE' AND priority.lookup_code(+) = ppe.priority_code AND class.lookup_type = 'PA_OBJECTS' AND class.lookup_code = 'PA_TASKS' AND ptt.task_type_id(+) = ppe.type_id AND progress.status_type(+) = 'PROGRESS' AND progress.project_status_code(+) = ppc.progress_status_code AND status.status_type(+) = 'TASK' AND status.project_status_code(+) = ppe.status_code AND ppe.object_type = 'PA_TASKS' AND ppe.project_id = ppa.project_id AND ppev.proj_element_id = ppe.proj_element_id AND ppev.parent_structure_version_id = pa_project_structure_utils.get_latest_wp_version(ppe.project_id) AND ppevsch.element_version_id(+) = ppev.element_version_id AND ppr.project_id(+) = ppc.project_id AND ppr.object_id(+) = ppc.object_id AND ppr.object_type(+) = ppc.object_type AND ppr.current_flag(+) = 'Y' AND ppr.structure_type(+) = 'WORKPLAN' AND ppr.structure_version_id(+) IS NULL AND ppe.manager_person_id = papf.person_id(+) AND trunc(SYSDATE) BETWEEN papf.effective_start_date(+) AND papf.effective_end_date(+) AND ppc.object_id(+) = ppe.proj_element_id AND ppc.object_type(+) = 'PA_TASKS' AND ppc.project_id(+) = ppe.project_id AND ppc.current_flag(+) = 'Y' AND ppc.current_flag(+) = 'Y' AND ppc.published_flag(+) = 'Y' AND ppc.structure_type(+) = 'WORKPLAN' AND nvl(ppa.template_flag, 'N') <> 'Y' AND ppe.link_task_flag = 'N' AND ppe.project_id = cqmh.project_id AND cqmh.header_id = :1 */ SELECT proj_element_id, element_version_id, '' AS phase_name, element_version_id AS parent_structure_version_id, '' AS task_type, structure_version_name AS task_name, fnd_css_pkg.encode(to_char(structure_version_number)) AS element_number, description, pa_structure_versions_v.project_id, NULL AS project_status_name, NULL AS status_icon_active_ind, NULL AS project_system_status_code, scheduled_start_date, scheduled_finish_date, decode((SELECT COUNT(1) FROM cux_quality_mag_detail cqmd WHERE cqmd.task_id = proj_element_id), 0, '否', '是') AS is_planed, decode((SELECT COUNT(1) FROM cux_quality_mag_detail cqmd WHERE cqmd.task_id = proj_element_id), 0, 'N', 'Y') AS show_detail FROM pa_structure_versions_v, cux_quality_mag_header cqmh WHERE element_version_id = pa_project_structure_utils.get_latest_wp_version(pa_structure_versions_v.project_id) AND structure_type = 'WORKPLAN' AND pa_structure_versions_v.project_id = cqmh.project_id AND cqmh.header_id = :1
